scheme_name: PM-YASASVI: Top Class College Education for OBC, EBC and DNT Students
description: The PM-YASASVI scheme provides scholarships to Other Backward Classes (OBC), Economically Backward Classes (EBC), and Denotified, Nomadic, and Semi-Nomadic Tribes (DNT) students for pursuing top-class college education in premier institutions. The scheme aims to promote higher education among these communities.
key_features: Covers OBC, EBC, and DNT students
Implemented by the Ministry of Social Justice and Empowerment

benefits.scholarship_amount: Up to Rs. 75,000 per year for tuition and Rs. 40,000 for other expenses
benefits.coverage: Tuition fees, books, living expenses, and laptop

education_criteria: Students enrolled in graduate or postgraduate courses
Courses must be in identified premier institutions (e.g., IITs, IIMs, AIIMS)
additional_criteria: Applicant must belong to OBC, EBC, or DNT communities
Annual family income must not exceed Rs. 2.5 Lakhs
eligibility.admission_requirement: Admission to identified premier institutions through merit or entrance tests
institution_criteria: Premier institutions listed under the PM-YASASVI scheme

eligible_courses_delhi: Graduate and postgraduate courses in engineering, medical, management, law, etc.
Courses offered by premier institutions like IITs, IIMs, AIIMS

steps: Register and fill out the PM-YASASVI application form
application_process.note: Apply within the academic year deadlines

required_documents.note: To prove family income below Rs. 2.5 Lakhs

special_notes: Limited to premier institutions listed under the scheme
